parameters.solutionTemplateName: Replace this value with a string matching RegExp ^(?!.*(?:-v-|v-))[a-zA-Z0-9-]{3,24}$
parameters.solutionTemplateVersionName: Replace this value with a string matching RegExp ^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$

targets.solutionInstanceName: Replace this value with a string matching RegExp ^(?!v-)(?!.*-v-)[a-zA-Z0-9]([-a-zA-Z0-9]*[a-zA-Z0-9])?(\.[a-zA-Z0-9]([-a-zA-Z0-9]*[a-zA-Z0-9])?)*$

body.solutionInstanceName: Replace this value with a string matching RegExp ^(?!v-)(?!.*-v-)[a-zA-Z0-9]([-a-zA-Z0-9]*[a-zA-Z0-9])?(\.[a-zA-Z0-9]([-a-zA-Z0-9]*[a-zA-Z0-9])?)*$

solutionDependencies.solutionInstanceName: Replace this value with a string matching RegExp ^(?!v-)(?!.*-v-)[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?$
